physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient 1: Profound hirsutism on arms, legs, chest, and face; round face; acne; generalized obesity. Patient 2: Tall, slender young woman without signs or symptoms of Cushing’s syndrome. Patient 3: No clinical symptoms of Cushing’s syndrome. Patient 4: Slight increase in facial hair growth. Patient 5: Severe tiredness, hirsutism, and oligomenorrhea.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1: Improvement of hirsutism following treatment. Patient 4: Fatigue and mental instability improved over 12 months on treatment; patient started working again and jogging. Patient 5: Hirsutism improved and menstrual pattern normalized after treatment.
